4.1.1.7.1.1. unduwave.undu_modules.undu_coils

Defining the functionality to representations of current-carrying coils.

4.1.1.7.1.1.1. Classes

undu_coils

A container class containing a list of coil objects which are to be created and simulated with Undumag.

coil

Coil class representing a currect carrying coil.

4.1.1.7.1.1.2. Module Contents

class unduwave.undu_modules.undu_coils.undu_coils(coils, api=None)

A container class containing a list of coil objects which are to be created and simulated with Undumag. :param list coils: A list of coil objects. :param api: The undu_api object carrying out the simulations. :type api: undu_api or None

move_it(vec)

Moving the center of the coil by vector vec.

Parameters:

vec (list) – A list containing the (x,y,z) components of the translation vector vec.

add_to_clc()

Add all daughter coils to the Undumag clc file for simulation.

set_all_apis()

Sets all daughter coil-api objects to the api object of this collection.

class unduwave.undu_modules.undu_coils.coil(coil_type, current, center_coords, normal_vec, rot_angle, length, inner_z, outer_z, inner_radius, height, n_vert, n_hor, n_rad, filling=None, n_windings=None, api=None)

Coil class representing a currect carrying coil. :param str coil_type: The type of coil. Can be one of the following:

Rectangular: A coil with 90° edges.

RectWindings: A coil with rounded edges.

Parameters:

  • current (float) – The current in the coil [mA]

  • center_coords (undu_magnets.point_coords) – The 3 center coordinates. [mm]

  • normal_vec (undu_magnets.point_coords) – Normal vector. The opening in the middle of the coil lies perpendicular to normal_vec. A normal_vec along (0,1,0) is the standard to which the parameter names refer!

  • rot_angle (float) – angle by which coil is rotated aroung normal_vec?

  • length (float) – Extension in x-direction. [mm]

  • inner_z (float) – Extension in z-direction of hole inside coil. [mm]

  • outer_z (float) – Extension in z-direction of full coil. The difference of outer and inner z determines the width of the coils running around the central hole. [mm]

  • inner_radius (float) – The inner radius of the curvature of the coil edges. [mm]

  • height (float) – The extent of the coil in y-direction. [mm]

  • n_vert,n_hor,n_rad (float) – Number of segmentations.

  • filling (float or None) – The percentage of the cross-section of the coil being filled with current carrying wire

  • n_windings (int or None) – The number of coils in a cross-section

  • api (undu_api or None) – The undu_api object carrying out the simulations.

set_api(api)

Setting the internal api if it is not None

Parameters:

api (undu_api) – The api object.

add_to_clc()

Gets the clc-text for this coil and adds it to the api._prog_paras.in_file_clc_lines list. The in_file_clc_lines lines object can be initialized or, if empty, will be initialized via the api.

move_it(vec)

Translates the center of the voil by the vector vec.

Parameters:

vec (undu_magnets.point_coords) – The translation vector.

create_clc_txt()

Creates the actual clc text from the object’s parameters

Return list:

The list containing str representing the content of the undumag clc file
